title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.15 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.15 - General provisions

State Regulations
(a) The
commission may require the applicant to furnish any further statements or
information which it deems necessary for proper consideration of an
application. (b) Permits are issued
by the commission only to indicate compliance with ECL, article 43 and do not
imply compliance with any other provision of law. (c) Any action of the commission by which an
application for a permit hereunder is denied, is reviewable pursuant to the
provisions of article 78 of the CPLR. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-7.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
